description: This table stores information about the required specialties for an order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NUM_SIG_REQ_BY_SPECIALTY
columns.description: This column stores the number of signatures required by a given specialty.

columns.name: BILLING_SPECIALTY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if providers of the given specialty can also be the billing provider. 'Y' indicates that the provider can also be the billing provider, 'N' or NULL indicates that they can not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: REQ_SPECIALTIES_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Reading Physician Roles category ID for the specialties required for resulting the study.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Radiology


Cardiology


Ophthalmology


Obstetrics


Test Supervisor


ECG Reader


Echo Reader


SPECT Reader
